\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.merge.exact.version.required}
\label{configuration:AmbethMergeExactVersionRequired}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether the exact version is needed to avoid an OptimisticLockException during update of an entity or all versions equals or higher are accepted. Valid values are "true" and "false", default is "false".

\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.merge.exact.version.required}}]
